content.p: Pronounce cmd.exe as C-M-D dot EXAY

div.h1:
An Ode to cmd.exe
You've been with me since the past century From 3.1 to XP, and beyond.
Oh, how I hate you so. You make selecting text so painful.
Your formatting, wonky. You refuse to change size. It's like using a concerte block.
Why, why cmd.exe? You've always been with me. I've hated you and tried to replace you. Go away. But you always stay.
Damn you, cmd.exe
(written in edit.com)
